summary: DEFECTIVE PARTS ---RIGHT AND LEFT SEAT BACK RECLINERS BROKE IN THE SAME IDENTICAL PLACES AFTER VERY LITTLE USE.  THE RIGHT SIDE BROKE WITH NO MORE THAN 4-5 TIMES  OF USE.  THE LEFT SIDE BROKE AFTER NO MORE THAN 10 TIMES OF USE.  IF THIS WAS A ITEM THAT GOT USED EVERY DAY I WOULD UNDERSTAND THEY MIGHT WEAR OUT.  I HAD THE EXTENDED WARRANTY BUT IT EXPIRES AT 75000 MILES SO GM REFUSES TO WARRANTY IT.    *NLM
